summary:
Here is a summary of the document in 3-5 sentences:

The document is a special edition of "The State of Fashion" report, a collaboration between The Business of Fashion and McKinsey & Company, focusing on the role of technology in the fashion industry. The report analyzes existing and emerging technologies addressing the industry's biggest challenges and opportunities. It covers various themes, including the metaverse, hyper-personalization, connected stores, end-to-end upgrades, and traceability. The report is based on research and insights from industry experts and provides an in-depth look at the current state of fashion technology.
